properties.label: %console-app~Perspectives%
properties.description: %console-app~Show or hide perspectives by enabling, disabling or adding access review checks.%

properties.label: %console-app~Quick Starts%
properties.description: %console-app~Configure a list of Quick Starts that are not shown to users.%

properties.label: %console-app~Theme%
properties.description: %console-app~Console will appear as per the selected theme.%

properties.label: %console-app~Perspective%
properties.description: %console-app~If a perspective is not selected, the console defaults to the last viewed.%

properties.label: %console-app~Project%
properties.description: %console-app~If a project is not selected, the console defaults to the last viewed.%

properties.label: %console-app~Create/Edit resource method%
properties.description: %console-app~If both form and YAML are available, the console defaults to your selection.%

properties.label: %console-app~Search%
properties.description: %console-app~Enable exact string match filtering on resources.%

properties.label: %console-app~Language%
properties.description: %console-app~Select the language you want to use for the console.%

properties.label: %console-app~User workload notifications%
properties.description: %console-app~Do not display notifications created by users for specific projects on the cluster overview page or notification drawer.%

fsType.name: %console-app~Filesystem Type%
fsType.hintText: %console-app~Filesystem type to use during volume creation. Default is ext4.%

kmsKeyId.name: %console-app~KMS key ID%
kmsKeyId.hintText: %console-app~The full Amazon resource name of the key to use when encrypting the volume%

fsType.name: %console-app~Filesystem type%
fsType.hintText: %console-app~Filesystem type to use during volume creation. Default is ext4.%

kmsKeyId.name: %console-app~KMS key ID%
kmsKeyId.hintText: %console-app~The full Amazon resource name of the key to use when encrypting the volume%

quobyteTenant.name: %console-app~Quobyte tenant%
quobyteTenant.hintText: %console-app~Quobyte tenant ID used to create/delete the volume%

repl.name: %console-app~Number of synchronous replicas to be provided in the form of replication factor%

snap_interval.name: %console-app~Snapshot interval%
snap_interval.hintText: %console-app~Clock/time interval in minutes for when to trigger snapshots%

aggregation_level.name: %console-app~Aggregation level%
aggregation_level.hintText: %console-app~The number of chunks the volume would be distributed into%

secretRef.name: %console-app~Secret reference%
secretRef.hintText: Reference to a configured Secret object

pool.name: %console-app~Pool%
pool.hintText: %console-app~Name of the StorageOS distributed capacity pool from which to provision the volume%

description.name: %console-app~Description%
description.hintText: %console-app~Description to assign to volumes that were created dynamically%

adminSecretName.name: %console-app~Admin secret name%
adminSecretName.hintText: %console-app~Name of the secret to use for obtaining the StorageOS API credentials%

adminSecretNamespace.name: %console-app~Admin secret namespace%
adminSecretNamespace.hintText: %console-app~Namespace where the API configuration secret is located%
